Hello!

I'm Divjeet, a design-minded software engineer and solutions architect focused on building beautiful interfaces & experiences

Get in touch djas@ucdavis.edu

Background

I am a master's student enrolled in the computer science program at the University of California, Davis. Currently, I am TA for DES 157B: Interactive Media III, Department of Design.

My recent work experience has been at my startup, Mushin Innovation Labs Pvt. Ltd. as a Chief Software Architect & Director, where I delivered 6 major projects within a year of taking charge. A part of my role was working with the Business Development team to establish the company’s portfolio, expanding the business verticals. I was also an integral part of the hiring and building of the company’s software team. Additionally, I managed a cross-platform team comprising of 6 frontend, backend, and cloud engineers.

As a software engineer, I enjoy bridging the gap between engineering and design — combining my technical knowledge with my keen eye for design to create a beautiful product. My goal is to always build applications that are scalable and efficient under the hood while providing engaging, pixel-perfect user experiences.

When I'm not in front of a computer screen, I'm probably enjoying a variety of activities like playing soccer, cycling, or crossing off another item on my bucket list.

Currently seeking summer'22 internship opportunities!

Other Projects
Remote Streetlight Monitoring System

An IoT based web application developed at Mushin, that interacts with a custom made hardware allowing user to control/monitor large number of street lights remotely.

Vue.js Laravel MySQL Vuetify Chart.js AWS MQTT
Pokédex

A simple pokédex made with React & PokéAPI.

React.js Axios TailwindCSS PokéAPI
COVID19 Dashboard

Dashboard developed using React.js, Chart.js, and COVID Time-Series API(Pomber) that shows the dynamics of the spread of coronavirus distribution per country.

React.js Chart.js React-bootstrap Pomber
AndroCOP

A lightweight and robust web application developed using Python/Pytorch that detects the presence of malware in an APK file using novel static analysis based on ML models with up to ~96% accuracy

Dash Plotly Python ML Pytorch
Mousely

A Utility Application made with OpenCV allowing the user to control the cursor with head movements and can perform click events using the blinking of eyes.

Python Quartz OpenCV Dlib

Awards
InCTF 2018, National Level Cybersecurity Competition

InCTF had both jeopardy style CTF and Attack-Defence style CTF.
